overview: Sunny Delights joins The American Way, The Heartland and California Gold in Junior Studio's collection of classic hardcore youth (18-23 y.o.) video. Blonde sensations Lee Walbash & Christian Owen (from California Gold) re-unite and Lee's sexual hunger develops in eye-catching new ways rarely seen on video. There are many scorching scenes which include: Junior Studio exclusive Jason Sizemore (18), who has a beautiful face & spectacular assets; the all new, super-cute, military blonde, Bryan Archer (20); plus three exciting foreign finds (Marcus Reika, Sven Viner, Van Kale); also the ravishing Ryan Scott & yummy Drew Peters.  The Junior Studio tradition of presenting awesome young men in their prime continues!
title: Sunny Delights
